root: ^Hyde widen his eyes in disbelief. It's been so long yet so short since the last time they've met. The person he once looked up to so much.
^The wrinkles that once wasn't there is like a trace-a little evident-on how much time passed. How long Hyde been parted with him.
^And how far Hyde needs to turn back the time.
^"I see you've been doing well, Hakase"
^The wind blows the man's coat. The nametag that once hidden, finally reveals itself.
^"...and I also see how much mess you made while I've gone"
^Dr. Hyde stops in the middle of his sentence. Leaving them in silence. As he takes a deep breath, a train of words escaped his lips.
^The little tremble he tries to hide in contrast with the fire in his eyes. He says, more to himself.
^"I can fix this. I can fix everything."
^A soft scoff escaped Dr. Nichole's lips.
^"..heh, sure. So tell me, Hakase, what will you do to fix this?"
^"I'll... travel back in time and stop this madness once and for all."
^"The last portal. The portal you've been working on, Doctor. Let me use it, please-"
^"-just like how you used the drug I made?"
^Dr. Hyde cut himself and lower his gaze. The guilt that once filling him, threaten to consume him once more.
^As he tighten his fists, he locks his gaze unto Dr. Nichole.
^"That was a mistake. I didn't mean to let things go this far, let alone an apocalypse."
^"Please, Dr. Nichole. I made my mistake once, and I'm willing to fix this. Will you help me out, please? Just this once?"
^The outstretched hands of Dr. Hyde reach out to Dr. Nichole, pleading for help.
^"Dr. Nichole. I need to save everyone. I need to make things right. Even if it tooks me thousands of timelines."
^"I need to fix this. If it's not for me, can you help me for the rest of remaining civilizations..?"
^Dr. Nichole's stoic expression didn't falter even one bit. Upon feeling the tightening grips on his shoulders, the wise researcher slips out a sigh.
^With a quick glance, he points the small chestbox behind his feet.
^Hyde's gaze follows Nichole's. The said chestbox is a small yet delicate box.
^"Open it and then I'll help you out."
^With furrowed eyebrows, Hyde's gaze scans through the locks.
